About Us

BACK TO HOME

Hey There! Come Along On Adventures With Me - A Wanderer At Heart, Exploring Countries Around The World From A very Young Age.

Welcome to my travel blog TravelBee, where I share all my adventures experiences and travel expertise from years of traveling around the globe since I was a child of only 15

To date, i have visited over 56 countries worldwide, all of which have been documented and photographed in my detailed blog post and videos over the previous ten years and shared with my 50,00+ loving followers, like yoy. Whether you're a first-time traveler or a seasoned wanderer like me, check out my content for tips, hacks, and more to help and inspire your next vacation.

John Smith

Travel Blogger & Photographer

A Day In The Tribal Camps Of California

Who hasn't heard of the stories of the true inhabitants inhabitants of this land -- the Native American the true tribal folks of America America? I had always nurtured a great longing to visit sites and locations around the country that held rich tribal histories histories. And so with the first chance. I have decided to spend a day in the Tribal Camps in Northern California.

Adventures On Top Of Alaskan Mountains

Ever since I have watched the movie "Into The Wild" when I was a kid. I wanted to travel to the frostly mountains of Alaska and take in the beauty of the great peaks that are always covered in snow. And after years in the beauty of the great peaks that are always covered in snow. And after years of planning and filling my luggage with enough food and warn clothes (unlike in the movie), last year I decided to start on my trip of a lifetime.

Bustling Around The Busy Streets of London

When I was a child all I wanted to do was travel to Hogwarts with Harry Potter and his friends. But when that didn't happen, I decided to tour across the nooks and crannies of Harry's homeland anyways - London and its countrysides. And so in this blog, come join me as i explore the busy and bustling streets London.
